channel.title: Petroleum refining on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Petroleum refining on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 China Petrochemical Corporation Logo
China Petrochemical Corporation or Sinopec Group is the world’s largest oil refining, gas and petrochemical conglomerate, administered by SASAC for the State Council of the People’s Republic of China. It is headquartered at Chaoyangmenwai in Beijing, across the road from the headquarters of fellow state-owned oil company and competitor CNOOC Group. Sinopec Group ranked the 2nd in the Fortune Global 500 List in 2020, with revenue over US$407 billion. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Sinopec was ranked as the 60th largest public company in the world.
You can download theSinopec Grouplogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Sinopec Group
item.description: China Petrochemical Corporation or Sinopec Group is the world’s largest oil refining, gas and petrochemical conglomerate, administered by SASAC for the State Council of the People’s Republic of China. It is headquartered at Chaoyangmenwai in Beijing, across the road from the headquarters of fellow state-owned oil company and competitor CNOOC Group. Sinopec Group ranked the 2nd in the Fortune Global 500 List in 2020, with revenue over US$407 billion. In the 2020 Forbes Global 2000, Sinopec was ranked as the 60th largest public company in the world.
